original_text: And I will also give thee into their hand, and they shall throw down thine eminent place, and shall break down thy high places: they shall strip thee also of thy clothes, and shall take thy fair jewels, and leave thee naked and bare.
korean_text: 내가 또 너를 그들의 손에 넘기리니 그들이 네 누각을 헐며 네 높은 대를 부수며 네 의복을 벗기고 네 장식품을 빼앗고 네 몸을 벌거벗겨 버려 두며

sentences.original_text: And I will also give thee into their hand
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 또한 너를 그들의 손에 넘기리니

sentences.original_text: and they shall throw down thine eminent place
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너의 높은 곳을 무너뜨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall break down thy high places
they shall strip thee also of thy clothes
and shall take thy fair jewels
and leave thee naked and bare
